doc.summary: A class used in the drops method to reduce ambiguity and make the code more readable.
doc.text: A class used in the drops method to reduce ambiguity and make the code more readable. Just call  the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/loot/BlockLootProviderBase" method="silk" type="(org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.loot.entry.GenericLootModifier<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block>)org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.loot.BlockLootProviderBase.SilkModifier">#silk(GenericLootModifier)</ref> method wih a generic loot modifier to get a silk modifier.  A silk modifier does not extend <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/loot/entry/GenericLootModifier">GenericLootModifier</ref> for this reason.
